name: TurquoiseNoise
0:
”Alexa open Turquoise Noise”
”Alexa ask Turquoise Noise to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: turquoise noise
des:
Experience a unique blend of noise frequencies similar to blue and green noises. This skill offers a balanced soundscape designed to mask background noise and promote a calm and focused atmosphere.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Turquoise Noise
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
